article_title: Editorial: If kids do count in Missouri, lawmakers must reverse trends
article_text:

article_metadata.news_keywords: , jason smith, annie e. casey foundation, deaconess foundation in st. louis, st. charles county, st. louis county, missouri legislature, food stamps, starsky wilson, ymca o'fallon park recreation complex, washington university brown school of social work

og.description: In one decade, the number of Missouri children living in poverty has gone from 212,369 to 302,185. Missouri is failing its children. It's that simple.
